snippet: A committee of the Academy of Nutrition and Dietetics dismissed a member whose objectivity on genetically modified food was questioned, but she also questioned others’ objectivity.
abstract: Politics of genetically modified food has created rift in policy-setting committee of Academy of Nutrition and Dietetics that demonstrates difficulty in finding anyone who does not already have opinion on issue; committee dismisses dietitian member Carole Bartolotto, who says she was removed for pointing out two of its members had ties to Monsanto, maker of genetically modified seeds.
lead_paragraph: A committee of the Academy of Nutrition and Dietetics dismissed a member whose objectivity on genetically modified food was questioned, but she also questioned others’ objectivity.

headline.seo: A Dismissal Raises Questions About Objectivity on Food Policy
headline.main: Food Politics Creates Rift in Panel on Labeling
headline.print_headline: Food Politics Creates Rift In Panel On Labeling
